agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Licensing & Administrative Procedures TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 19, 2019 PLACE: E2.028 CHAIR: Rep. Tracy King HB 914 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the regulation of bingo games. HB 1186 Kuempel Relating to the prizes awarded in certain pull-tab bingo games. HB 1140 King, Tracy O. Relating to the adjustment of fees for vehicles stored at vehicle storage facilities; authorizing fee increases. HB 1998 Goldman Relating to the importation and use for manufacturing purposes of malt beverages by the holder of a brewer's permit or manufacturer's license. HB 467 Hernandez Relating to sexual assault and domestic violence awareness continuing education for cosmetology license holders. HB 2228 Geren Relating to the inspection of certain boilers. HB 2016 Guillen Relating to the sale of certain wine by the holder of a wine and beer retailer's permit or mixed beverage permit. HB 2196 Harris Relating to the sale of alcoholic beverages on certain property owned by the Texas State Railroad Authority. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
